objectives.title: Invariants Hold Under Concurrency
objectives.assertion: Declared concurrency adversarial suite must report pass with no unresolved critical invariant violations.

objectives.title: IR and Runtime Semantics Align
objectives.assertion: Parity continuity and canonical gate checks must show no unresolved semantic drift for declared scope.

objectives.title: Spec DSL Is Usable by Non-Programmers
objectives.assertion: Usability evidence for non-programmer workflows must be present with pass status on declared task suite.

objectives.title: Migrations Are Executable and Replay-Verified
objectives.assertion: Migration protocol evidence must show safe preflight/cutover/rollback coverage and replay verification pass.

objectives.title: Backends Are Oracle-Equivalent on Declared Scope
objectives.assertion: Parity envelope differential evidence must pass for declared operator scope across sqlite and postgres.
